name: Hard Truck Apocalypse: Arcade / Ex Machina: Arcade
description: Hard Truck Apocalypse: Arcade/Ex Machina Arcade - is the races through the deserted prairies and canyons of northern America, infected by a fatal virus. You are to find the reasons of the global catastrophe described in the original game Hard Truck: Apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Pentium 4/Athlon XP 2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible 128 MB graphics Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Pentium 4/Athlon 64 3 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible 256 MB graphics Storage: 1500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Boring, a waste of money and it has not a single one of the nice aspects of the old Hard Truck Apocalypse titels in it. A shame.

This game locked up my system on the first attempt to load, and only successfully started after a second attempt. I really do not care for the way this game runs, and I would advice people to hold off until the bugs are worked out.  BTW, I could never get HTA Ex Machina to load, and because I haven't played it for a minimum of five minutes, I cannot write a review of trhe game.
